Content_FullWidth.Name: Presidents QA
Content_FullWidth.Title: President's Q&A
Content_FullWidth.BodyCopy:
New President's Executive Group Q&A Schedule

Employee Q&A

A new schedule has been created for the employee Q&A sessions with President Clark and the vice presidents. Instead of rotating between 7 a.m., noon, and 5 p.m. start times, all Q&As will be held during the noon hour in the MC Special Events Room. Submitting questions in advance is no longer required. The following Q&A sessions are for employees only. The President holds seperate Q&A sessions for students.

2013 Schedule:

Friday, January 11th Noon MC Special Events Room
Thursday, February 7th Noon MC Special Events Room
Wednesday, March 6th Noon MC Special Events Room
Thursday, April 11th Noon MC Special Events Room
Friday, May 17th Noon MC Special Events Room
Thursday, June 5th Noon MC Special Events Room
Wednesday, July 10th Noon MC Special Events Room
Thursday, August 15th Noon MC Special Events Room
Friday, September 13th Noon MC Special Events Room
Thursday, October 10th Noon MC Special Events Room
Friday, November 1st Noon MC Special Events Room
Thursday, December 5th Noon MC Special Events Room

Student Q&A

Student Q&A sessions are now held seperately. For a schedule click here.
